requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD / NVIDIA GeForce / AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD / NVIDIA RTX / AMD RYZEN
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

results.name: Space Shooter The best one ever (requires python 3.9.2 or 3.10)
ECLIPSE; THE CURSE OF THE SUN AND THE MOON
